|-------|-----|----------|
| Ulysses|  | Alice |
| Bob    |   | Frankenstein|
| Frankenstein|  | Bob |
| Claire   |     | No Exit|
| No Exit |   | The Catcher in the Rye|
| The Catcher in the  |   | Claire |

After the swaps:

| Alice |   | Ulysses |
|-------|-----|----------|
| Lolita|  | Claire |
| Bob    |   | Frankenstein|
| Frankenstein|  | Bob |
| Claire   |     | Ulysses |
| Ulysses |   | Alice |
| No Exit |   | The Catcher in the Rye|
| The Catcher in the  |   | Claire |

Therefore, the answer is (C) Lolita.
